Body: Is it possible to identify click sounds like [‖ ʘ !] by formant transitions in the surrounding vowels? I know stops and fricatives have that feature. I'm just wondering how the five (main) click sounds differ from each other acoustically.
Title: Are click sounds accompanied by specific formant transitions?

LastEditedUser.AboutMe: Undergraduate Student of Computer Engineering and Linguistics at Christian-Albrechts-Universität Kiel.
